content.question: Using the excerpts, respond to parts a, b, and c. Briefly describe one major difference between Cohen’s and Katznelson’s historical interpretations of the New Deal. Briefly explain how one event or development from 1932 to 1945 that is not explicitly mentioned in the excerpts could be used to support Cohen’s argument. Briefly explain how one event or development from 1932 to 1945 that is not explicitly mentioned in the excerpts could be used to support Katznelson’s argument.

frqParts.text: Using the excerpts, respond to parts a, b, and c. Briefly describe one major difference between Cohen’s and Katznelson’s historical interpretations of the New Deal. skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
